original_text: “If the disease breaks out again in the house, after he has taken out the stones and scraped the house and plastered it,
korean_text: 돌을 빼내며 집을 긁고 고쳐 바른 후에 색점이 집에 재발하면

sentences.original_text: If the disease breaks out again in the house,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그 집에 병이 다시 생기면,

sentences.original_text: after he has taken out the stones
